cause.description:
recently marc (kezz) cut his flowing mane. at first it wouldnt seem that bad, after all....kieran did it and he's still a complete stud-lauren and sarah will agree, but the cut has given marc the likeness of a full-blown, leather-wearing lesbo. any money we can raise is worth it as long as we can help marc and his poor girlfriend kelsey.
1. marc is a man!!! lets help him stay one!!
cause.mission: Raise enough money to save marc's hair
cause.name: Save Marc From Lesbianism
